steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_test_design_test_cases --> navigate to Page_test-design_test-cases
step 5: At Page_test-design_test-cases click on hyperlink_test_design_test_suites --> navigate to Page_test-design_test-suites
step 6: At Page_test-design_test-suites click on button_select_organization
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page_test-design_test-suites
